thread.title: Christina Grimmie Left Out of Grammys "In Memoriam" Segment - Grimmie Fans Slam Grammys for Snub
thread.title_full: Christina Grimmie Left Out of Grammys "In Memoriam" Segment - Grimmie Fans Slam Grammys for Snub

author: Peggy Truong
title: Christina Grimmie Left Out of Grammys "In Memoriam" Segment - Grimmie Fans Slam Grammys for Snub
text: — monroe scott (@MonroeGScott) February 13, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below They didn't mention Christina, #GRAMMYs you just had to put a picture and that would mean a lot. Hearts broken but Christina is forever... — Grimmie Support (@support_grimmie) February 13, 2017 As Billboard notes, Grimmie, a popular YouTube star who competed on season six of The Voice , is part of a longer “Grammy In Memoriam” list that was published over the weekend on the official Recording Academy website . Screenshot | Grammy.com Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Grimmie was also noticeably absent from the Emmy Awards’ In Memoriam segment in September . A spokesperson later released a statement on the controversy, noting that the segment “is constrained by time and space” every year and the telecast “cannot include every significant person who as passed.” In August, Grimmie fans also expressed anger at the Teen Choice Awards after the singer was left out of a segment that paid tribute to victims of gun violence. On Monday, Grimmie’s family took to her official Instagram to thank fans for the support and for “always remembering our superstar,” along with the hashtag #GrammyForGrimmie. A photo posted by Christina Grimmie (@therealgrimmie) on Feb 13, 2017 at 4:53am PST Follow Peggy on Twitter .
